aboutdesc: This website is a project for Marje3 club team at Princess Sumaya University for Technology (PSUT).
vision: Our vision is to support the student from all academic and advisory aspects, promote the values ​​of cooperation and teamwork, support skills, build an educational life and social experience, help students to communicate and to discuss.
clubValues: Excellence in performance, teamwork, affiliation, and responsibility.
objective1: Encouraging volunteer tendencies, serving students, promoting the concept of teamwork, and consolidating the values ​​of cooperation among students.
objective2: Supporting academic majors with a practical aspect to raise students’ technical efficiency and help them.
objective3: Follow up students who fail academically.
objective4: Breaking the barrier of fear among students and getting to know new colleagues.
objective6: Finally, returned something of the kindness that our dear university offered us.
management: The club manages, plans and organizes activities and programs, also provides academic and advisory services through the following:
activity1: Forming a volunteer team to serve the university and students.
activity2: Team of lectures and material references (year questions, books, summaries, notebooks).
activity4: Receiving new students and introducing them to the university and its majors.
activity5: Guiding and assisting students (in selecting subjects before the start of registration in each semester).
activity6: Holding revision classes before the exams period by students who excel in the subject.
supportBody3: Employees in various departments and deanships.
idea1: Gathering Erasmus students and cultural exchange to talk about their experiences and help students in their application + making an explanatory video.
idea2: Organizing trips to companies (according to specialization).
idea3: Photographing university life and highlighting it in the best way.
